author: pier
msg: - Now values of URL-encoded sessions are correctly handled (Thanks to
- Locales are set correctly in the request object, parsing the
Accept-Languages header as done in the HTTP/1.1 connector.
- The query string is now set to null if there are no query parameters.
With this patch, mod_webapp using WARP runs all WatchDog compliancy tests

author: pier
msg: Fix for bug #2933. CGI scripts are now functional even when mod_webapp
is running (took me 3 days to figure out WHY, darn!)

author: jfclere
msg: make install was installing in /usr/local/lib instead of apache_dir/libexec.

msg: When uri does not start with / uwr is not initialised correctly it caused

msg: Test the context if it does not start with '/' uri_worker_map_add makes
